TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "Hey Detective, don't mind me."

BODY: "Hmph, the Abra Gazette's really scraping the bottom of the barrel nowadays."

TITLE: You
BODY: "Well aren't you a sight for sore eyes."

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "And here I thought gumshoes had no heart. What do you need?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "Do you recognize anything here?"

BODY: "Believe it or not I do, the driver was a frequent hunter around these parts. Member of the Abra Hunting Club."[back21][unlock214]

TITLE: You
BODY: "That's everything I need."

TITLE: You
BODY: "You reporters have your uses after all."

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "Always happy to be of service Detective." [end]

TITLE: You
BODY: [locked]"Happen to know anything about the stiff?"

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "He liked to talk a big game about how he could take on many of the supernatural elements that live around here, always spoutin' off his plans."[back21]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Hey pal, I got a few questions that need answers."

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "I bet you do."

TITLE: You
BODY: "Do you recognize anything here?"

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "I recognize the guy. Frequent hunter around these parts, member of the Abra Hunting Club."

BODY: "I notice his gun there too, but I wonder why he doesn't have the rest of his equipment."[back31]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Anything strange stick out to you?"

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "Those footprints sure do, they start and stop without warning, and they definitely don't look human."

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "Maybe it's got other means of getting around."[back31]

BODY: "I think I got all I need."[end]

BODY: "You were the first officer on scene, correct?"

TITLE: Officer Jameson
BODY: "That's correct."

BODY: "So who noticed the sorry sap first?"

BODY: "Some local called it in, but they didn't stick around."[back11]

TITLE: You
BODY: "What'd you see when you got here?"

TITLE: Officer Jameson
BODY: "Everything you see here, except the driver was still alive."[back11][unlock114]

TITLE: You
BODY: "That's all for now, thanks."[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: [locked] "You're telling me that the stiff was still kicking?"

TITLE: Officer Jameson
BODY: "Yep, when I arrived it looked like he was frozen to his seat. I snapped him out of it I think, but then he just started spouting nonsense."

TITLE: Officer Jameson
BODY: "I removed him from the truck, and he wasn't even bleeding that badly, but next thing you know he collapses into me, dead as a doornail."[back11]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Lets make this quick, I don't want to be burning the midnight oil."

BODY: "Well, I'm doing fine."

BODY: "Not the point, listen, can you answer some questions?"

BODY: "If I gotta."[back11]

BODY: "I guess."[back11]

BODY: "I have some questions."

BODY: "What do you got for me."

BODY: "You were the first one here, right?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "When did this happen?"

BODY: "I couldn't tell ya for certain, I got here around 1:30, so the guy couldn't have detoured into a tree earlier than 1:00"[back31]

TITLE: You
BODY: "I think that's everything."[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: [locked] "What condition was the driver in?"

BODY: "He was still alive, at first he wasn't responsive at all, but I think I snapped him out of it when I tried moving him, and he lost it."

TITLE: You
BODY: "What do you mean he 'lost it'?"

TITLE: Officer Jameson
BODY: "Like, rambling and sputtering, all nonsense, but he must've tired himself out cause after a bit he collapsed."[back31]

TITLE: You
BODY: "How hurt was he?"

TITLE: Officer Jameson
BODY: "I've seen more people survive worse, sure he was bleeding, but nowhere important. But then, after a minute, the poor dude just collapsed into me."[back31]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Crash must've rattled him badly."[back31]

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "Well if it isn't my favorite slueth"

TITLE: You
BODY: "Now what's a newshound doing around here?"

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "Just doin' my job, you just come by to chat?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "Yep, not too worried about this case."

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "That's either a great sign, or a terrible one."[end]

BODY: "Nah, just got some questions for you."

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "I see."

BODY: "What do you make of this?"

BODY: "I dunno, looks like some washed up wreck, definitely got attacked out there, but who knows why."[back1121]

TITLE: You
BODY: "This doesn't happen often does it?"

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "No it does not, and good thing too, given a lot of ours dependence on the water."[back1121][unlock11215]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Do you know anything about this victim?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "I think that's everything."[end]

BODY: [locked] "Why aren't there more sorry saps at the bottom of the lake?"

BODY: "Most creatures in the sea aren't that aggressive, especially towards bigger ships. This couldn't have been a random attack."[back1121]

BODY: [locked] "Must've been a fisher though, right?"

BODY: "This is a fishing ship, but I don't see the equipment. Plenty of fishermen have odd jobs around here, maybe they were on an errand."[back1121]

BODY: "Notice anything off?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "Know anything about the victim?"

BODY: "Know anything about the ship?"

BODY: "Seems like a standard gillnetter, fishing ship, though they could've been using it for anything. A lot of sailors in Oldport have side-gigs."[back21]

TITLE: Eric Meng

BODY: "Better get to your point"[back31]

TITLE: Eric Meng

BODY: "Have you seen this happen before?"

BODY: "My minute's up, that's everything."[end]

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "Well if it isn't my favorite Detective, come to determine if the killings fall in line with the local legend The Beast of the Forest."

TITLE: You
BODY: "Beast of The Forest?"

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "Why yes, you've never heard if the legends that surrounded the forest."

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "I personally don't know much about them, but I do know that a few month's back someone had a bounty."

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "Placed on the creature's head for either it's capture or proof that it had been killed. It's part of the reason so many people are out camping in the area."

TITLE: You
BODY: "Does anyone know who put out the bounty?"

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "Now that's the puzzling thing Detective, anyone that I managed to get a hold of didn't seem to have the slightest idea."

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "All they said what that one day the local newspaper mentioned that some benefactor had put forth a large sum of money for either their death or capture."[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Why would someone want to pursue a fairytale?"

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "I couldn't even begin to wonder why someone would either be crazy enough to try and pursue one of these creatures, much less try to have one brought in alive."

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "Something about this whole situation seems extremly fishy to me. Like were not seeing the whole picture. But I'm determined to get to the bottom of this."

TITLE: Eric Meng
BODY: "The people must know the truth!"[end]

BODY: "I don't have time for this."

TITLE: Onlooker

TITLE: Onlooker
BODY: "W-well I saw it."

TITLE: You
BODY: "What was it?"

TITLE: Onlooker
BODY: "You know that thing everyone is always talking about that lurks in the forest."

TITLE: You

TITLE: Onlooker
BODY: "I didn't see much, all I can tell you is that I was sound asleep when suddenly I heard screams that made my blood run cold."

TITLE: Onlooker
BODY: "I poked my head out of my tent to investigate and it was then that I saw it. It was some hulking beast. I would say that it was easily around 8 to 15 feet tall."

TITLE: Onlooker

BODY: The onlooker only shrinks further into themselves as a result.

TITLE: You
BODY: "Were you present at the time of the attack?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "Are you sure there wasn't anything?"

TITLE: Tarot Card Merchant

TITLE: Tarot Card Merchant

TITLE: Tarot Card Merchant

TITLE: Tarot Card Merchant

TITLE: Lary Ant
BODY: "You have reached the household of Ant, this is Lary Ant speaking."

TITLE: You
BODY: "I'm a Detective with the ACPD I have a few questions for you."

TITLE: Lary Ant
BODY: "Ah, I was wondering when I would get this phone call. Yes what can I do for you?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "Why did you have the precinct pass your information on to me?"

TITLE: Lary Ant
BODY: "I was close with one of the hunters that had been killed recently and hearing about that the next victims might have been thoses two kids."

TITLE: Lary Ant
BODY: "I felt like I couldn't just not provide any help at all."[back11]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Has anything strange occured in the forest lately?"

TITLE: Lary Ant
BODY: "Well it's a still a few weeks from the hunting season for the game that I'm after, so I haven't been out there a whole lot right now."

TITLE: Lary Ant
BODY: "But I have heard a few of my camping buddies mentioning that something big seems to be prowling about."

TITLE: Lary Ant
BODY: "They claim that they've found animals torn to shreds, one of them even claming that they came across a bear that had it's back broken."

TITLE: Lary Ant
BODY: "Now I haven't actually seen anything like this myself, so I don't think it's anymore than Beast of the Forest mumbo jumbo."[back11]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Were you there on the night of the attack?"

BODY: "I wasn't no, but there might have been someone who was?"[back11]

TITLE: Lary Ant
BODY: "A guy that let's just say, really likes The Beast of the Forest."

TITLE: Lary Ant
BODY: "Most people refer to him as the local weirdo, but I believe that his name is Edwin."[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: "You wanted to talk about the forest murders?"

TITLE: Lary Ant
BODY: "Ah, I was wondering when I would get this phone call. Yes what can I do for you?"[back11]

TITLE: Flora Burn
BODY: "Hello?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "Is this Flora Burn?"

TITLE: Flora Burn
BODY: "Yes, who is this?"

TITLE: You

TITLE: Flora Burn
BODY: "Oh! Have you found him? Has Wyatt been found? He said that he would only be out camping for a few days."

TITLE: Flora Burn
BODY: "But I haven't heard from him in a while and I'm starting to get worried."

TITLE: Flora Burn

TITLE: Flora Burn
BODY: "Now if you'll excuse me I have preperations to make."[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Do you have any idea why Wyatt went out camping?"

TITLE: Flora Burn
BODY: "He didn't tell me a whole lot about it, though he did mention something about this being his chance."

TITLE: You
BODY: "Hello, I'm a detective calling about Wyatt Burn."

TITLE: Flora Burn
BODY: "Oh?! Please tell me you found him."[back111111]

TITLE: Todiri Poppy
BODY: "Yes?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "I'm a detective investing these forest murders, I have to ask you a few questions."

TITLE: Todiri Poppy
BODY: "Why of course Detective, what is it that you need to know?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "Do you know anything about The Beast of the Forest?"

TITLE: Todiri Poppy
BODY: "The Beast of the Forest? I don't deal in fairytales dear Detective. If you want to be talked to death about things that aren't real I suggest talking to Edwin."

TITLE: Todiri Poppy
BODY: "The Beast is the only thing he ever talks about these days."[back11]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Is there anything you can tell me about Wyatt?"

TITLE: Todiri Poppy
BODY: "Ah yes Wyatt Burn, a sweet boy that always felt like he had something to prove."

TITLE: Todiri Poppy
BODY: "Rumor has it that he went out in the forest to try and capture that rediculous Beast of the Forest."

TITLE: Todiri Poppy
BODY: "All to claim the reward on it's head, another fool chasing something that isn't there. Though the usualy come back ratled and scared half to death, not missing."

TITLE: Todiri Poppy
BODY: "Though I've heard that more and more people have been dying for this pointless persuit recently, such a waste of life."[back11]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Was there anyone else that hasn't been seen for a while?"

TITLE: Todiri Poppy
BODY: "There was one girl that I've heard hasn't been around the same amount of time that Wyatt has. I believe her name was Clover, Wyatt was always sweet on her."

TITLE: Todiri Poppy
BODY: "I've heard some people saying that they had both just simply ran away together never to be seen again."

TITLE: Todiri Poppy
BODY: "Though others believe that they were the ones to be the victims of the attack."

TITLE: Todiri Poppy
BODY: "Clover was said to always been seen around wearing a braclet that Wyatt gave to her."

TITLE: Todiri Poppy
BODY: "That is everything that I've heard about the matter, do with the information what you will."[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: "I'm with the Abra Police, I was told you had information."

TITLE: Todiri Poppy
BODY: "Why of course Detective, what is it that you need to know?"[back11]

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "Yes, who is this? Who sent you? You won't take me alive!"

TITLE: You
BODY: "Calm down sir, I'm a detective, I just want to ask you a few questions about The Beast of the Forest."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "Well why didn't you just say so, I didn't realize that the authorities would have anyone in their ranks with an interest in what so many people write off as a fairytale."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "Now what would you like to know?"

TITLE: You
BODY: "Do you have any idea what The Beast could even be?"

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "Now that is something that has been debated by many that have come here in search of it. No two reports of The Beast ever being exactly the same."[back1111]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Have there been any reports about the creature?"

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "There have been many over the years, going all the way back to when it was claimed to have first been seen many years ago."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "The reports are only ever increasing in frequency since that blasted reward was announcd a few months back. All of them having little consistency with one another."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "With the closest being that there have been several people that have claimed that The Beast looked to be some kind of feral deer standing on its hind legs."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "While a few others have claimed to see what they have described to be a very large bear with mangy fur and dried blood on it's pelt."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "I believe that there were even one or two people that claimed that they saw something akin to a fox or coyote that looks completly feral."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "As for me I think that it's some kind of creature beyound our comprehension. A spirit of the forest given physical form, attacking those that disrespect it."[back1111]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Were you there the night that The Beast attacked."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "I was....it was supposeted to be the happiest night of my life. As it was where I got to truly see The Beast in all its glory."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "A beautiful thing that towered among the trees, bigger than anything animal I have ever seen."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "Though I will admit that it looked more like a walking corpse than it did a majestic creature of legend."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "I swear that I could almost see the skeleton of the creature pushing through it's skin in some areas."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "But then that beatiful moment was shattered by shoutting coming from one of the nearby campsites."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "At first I though nothing of it, but then The Beast began bounding twards the source of the noise."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "Their shouts quickly being replaced of that of blood curtling screams."[back1111]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Has anyone else been attacked recently?"

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "There are usually always a few different atttacks from what people claim to be The Beast, though they usually tend to only have scrapes a bruises."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "But there was said to be someone that had stumbled into one of the campsites with large gash marks on his body."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "Unfortuantly he died before they got him to the hosipital."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "There may be other incidents but that is the only one I know of."[end]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Look pal I don't have time for all this conspiratory nonsence."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "You don't scare me cop, I've been through hell and back in 86'. Nothing you can say will ever get under my skin, now what is it you want anyways."

TITLE: You
BODY: "I'm calling to ask about some big monster."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "Big monster....you mean the legendary Beast of the Forest. The fabled monster is said to be as tall as a house and as strong as 50 men."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "Said to attack those that cause a disturbance in the forest that it roams."

TITLE: You
BODY: "Yes, that is the one, is there anything you can tell me?"

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "I know just about everything there's to know about it. Some would even call me an expert in the subject matter. Now what is it you would like to know?"[back1111]

TITLE: You
BODY: "Maybe.....I don't know and I honestly don't care, I just need any information that you may have on the case. Then we can both go on with our lives."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "Young folk, always so rude and pushy to get answers. Never did respect your elders enough, did you boy? For that you'll get nothing from me."

TITLE: Edwin
BODY: "Go bully your information out of someone else."[end]
